caption: In the end, the captain killed the separatist. Suddenly, he heard several gunshots, he immediately hid behind a table. In fact, it was Gaspare. He came to help with many weapons. They found a room with a camera inside. There were many videos of victims. The separatists kept them as hostages and demanded ransom from their families. At this moment, the separatists on the island found the plane and took control of the passengers. They obtained the passenger list and asked where the captain was. In the meantime, two passengers tried to escape, but they failed and were killed. Everyone was scared. The captain and Gaspare also saw this scene in the distance.
